short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1.) Navigate to all the Technia content


2.) Manage JIRA tickets 


3.) Monitor & export the time spent

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hassle-free access to monitor your daily time on the browser with functions  such as chart view, pie-view or even download and delete the data
With the motive of taking self improvement and productivity in account, there is third feature also provided 'Monitor Time'.
1.) Button Monitor time will load a table which displays URLS,  Active Time Spent (For ex :if i spend 1.5hr on google and 0.5h on gmail then active time shown will be 1hr,30mins on google and 30mins on gmail) on these URLs and Last Visited date on the URL.
2.) Button Chart-Bar will display the data of time spent accorss different tabs in chrome in form of a bar-chart.
3.) Button Pie-Chart will display the data of time spent accross different tabs in chrome in form of a pie-chart shwoing different sections.
4.) Button DELETE which will delete the entire table .
5.) EXPORT which will export the entire URLs data into excel if table is present

TRAVERSE TECHNIA chrome extension
